definition: to be a tax on (one's mind)/to bother/to trouble/to be concerned
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
God/abbr. for 神舟[Shen2 zhou1]
deity/soul/spirit/unusual/mysterious/lively/expressive/expression/look/CL:個|个[ge4]/(slang) awesome/amazing

sentences.english: Rather than dealing with your mail yourself, you can outsource the task.
sentences.chinese: 處理郵件的事你可以申請外援，不必親自勞神。

sentences.english: And sometimes I don't want to bother explaining things to people who are quick to judge.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，我並不想勞神向那些輕易下結論的人解釋。

sentences.english: The preparations of tables and fruit offerings are really time-consuming, why bother?
sentences.chinese: 擺放桌子及水果等貢品很花費時間，何必勞神呢？

sentences.english: This is the problem that will consume the next president.
sentences.chinese: 這是將使下一任總統勞神費力的問題。

sentences.english: I’m putting it on my list, so I won’t have to share.
sentences.chinese: 我已經把它放在我的列表中了，所以不用勞神分享了。

sentences.english: But don't bother to apply fora job there.
sentences.chinese: 但不要勞神去這家公司找工作了。

sentences.english: But don't bother to apply for a job there.
sentences.chinese: 但不要勞神去這家公司找工作了。

sentences.english: it's the only one the mainstream has bothered to acknowledge.
sentences.chinese: 這卻是主流勞神費心認可的唯一看法。

definition: lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
deeply worried (idiom); to feel anxious
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair
to feel hatred/to harbor a grudge
to forget
to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
compassion/empathetic
toil/hard work
a golden house to keep one's mistress (idiom); a magnificent house built for a beloved woman
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
to force someone to do something
to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to imitate the dog and steal chicken (idiom)/to pilfer/to dally with women/to have affairs
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
